headline: Is Sabre (SABR) Using Its New AI Alliances To Redefine Its Competitive Moat?
summary: In early February 2026, Sabre Corporation announced a series of developments, including an AI-powered travel alliance with PayPal and Mindtrip, new AI shopping technology, expanded Chinese hotel content, and a renewed SabreSonic PSS agreement with WestJet. Together, these moves highlight Sabre’s push to embed agentic AI across its platform while deepening airline and lodging relationships in key global markets. Next, we’ll examine how this AI-powered Mindtrip partnership and broader product...

headline: PayPal Stock Falls 31% as New CEO Inherits Execution Crisis
summary: If you have been closely watching shares of PayPal (NASDAQ:PYPL), you haven’t missed its 30.7% collapse year-to-date, with retail investor sentiment on Reddit turning sharply bearish. The fintech pioneer’s weekly sentiment score plunged to 37, down from a neutral 57.4 over the past month, as traders digested a brutal earnings miss and disappointing 2026 guidance. ... PayPal Stock Falls 31% as New CEO Inherits Execution Crisis

headline: PayPal's Ex-President David Marcus Wants US To Rotate 'Very Tiny Slice' Of Gold Reserves Into Bitcoin: 'But Do It Very Slowly'
